Title: Spit Take
Plot: Andy inspires to become humorous by joining a comedy improv class. Elsewhere, a down Brendan becomes introspective, and looks to become self medicated. Also, Bobby's girlfriend is haunted by visa problems, and Stephanie's book back-cover biography is full of more fiction than facts.
GuestStars: Nia Vardalos, Michael McDonald, Zoe Perry, Chris Spinelli, Jean Villepique, Sharni Vinson
